== Design guidelines ==
* The general idea is to create a pictogram. As described <nowiki>[[http://design.canonical.com/brand/8.%20Pictograms.pdf|here]]</nowiki>
* The Ubuntu colors codes are described <nowiki>[[http://design.canonical.com/brand/5.%20Ubuntu%20colour%20palettes%20and%20colour%20landscape.pdf|here]]</nowiki>.
=== Ideas ===
After a quick IRC brainstorming we thought that the following tools would represent the concept of PowerUsers. If you want to help please add your idea on the list to better inspire our artists :)
* Hammer
* Wrench
* Powerdrill
* Toolbox
* ...

== Logo Submission ==
We'll collect in this page all the proposed logos
